questions.question: 1.The light of fluorescent tube appears cooler than that from an incandescent lamp. This is due to the fact that

answers.b: Surface area of tube is larger than that of the incandescent lamp
answers.c: Tungsten is not used in the tube

explanations.a: Fluorescent lamp (electric discharge lamp) is cooler and more efficient than incandescent lamps that produces light by the fluorescence of a phosphor coating. The reason behind this is the tube consumes less power. here

questions.question: 4.The efficiency of a fluorescent lamp is________.

explanations.c: A fluorescent bulb produces less heat, so it is much more efficient. A fluorescent bulb can produce between 50 and 100 lumens per watt. This makes fluorescent bulbs four to six times more efficient than incandescent bulbs.
